title: Enter for a Chance to Win Merch from the DOOM: The Dark Ages x Harley-Davidson Collab
author: coreydemoss
excerpt: Attention, Aussies! DOOM: The Dark Ages and Harley-Davidson have teamed up for a special collaboration and created a custom jacket and helmet (pictured above) inspired by the DOOM Slayer. That’s cool and all, but the even better news? They’re giving them away, and you have the chance to win them.
text: Attention, Aussies! DOOM: The Dark Ages and Harley-Davidson have teamed up for a special collaboration and created a custom jacket and helmet (pictured above) inspired by the DOOM Slayer. That’s cool and all, but the even better news? They’re giving them away, and you have the chance to win them.Entering the giveaway couldn’t be simpler. All you have to do is go down to the comments of this article and answer this question: What would be your ultimate weapon if you were in DOOM? Do that between now and 10 a.m. AEST on 19 May, and you’re entered. That’s it. We'll pick our favorite answer, and that one winner will get both the jacket and helmet.Now, there are some rules, of course. To win, you need to be at least 18 years old and a legal resident of Australia. And just enter one time — if you try to submit multiple entries, you could be disqualified. We’ll reach out to the winner to get details and figure out where to send the merch, so make sure you respond promptly when we get in touch. If we don’t hear back from you, we’ll move on to another winner.For the full terms and conditions, you can check them out here. Best of luck to you!
html:
Attention, Aussies! DOOM: The Dark Ages and Harley-Davidson have teamed up for a special collaboration and created a custom jacket and helmet (pictured above) inspired by the DOOM Slayer. That’s cool and all, but the even better news? They’re giving them away, and you have the chance to win them.

Entering the giveaway couldn’t be simpler. All you have to do is go down to the comments of this article and answer this question: What would be your ultimate weapon if you were in DOOM? Do that between now and 10 a.m. AEST on 19 May, and you’re entered. That’s it. We'll pick our favorite answer, and that one winner will get both the jacket and helmet.

Now, there are some rules, of course. To win, you need to be at least 18 years old and a legal resident of Australia. And just enter one time — if you try to submit multiple entries, you could be disqualified. We’ll reach out to the winner to get details and figure out where to send the merch, so make sure you respond promptly when we get in touch. If we don’t hear back from you, we’ll move on to another winner.

For the full terms and conditions, you can check them out here. Best of luck to you!
